                # Returns secrets added to config/secrets.yml.
          
      397. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    397. 
            
            

            

                #
          
      398. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    398. 
            
            

            

                # Example:
          
      399. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    399. 
            
            

            

                #
          
      400. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    400. 
            
            

            

                #     development:
          
      401. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    401. 
            
            

            

                #       secret_key_base: 836fa3665997a860728bcb9e9a1e704d427cfc920e79d847d79c8a9a907b9e965defa4154b2b86bdec6930adbe33f21364523a6f6ce363865724549fdfc08553
          
      402. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    402. 
            
            

            

                #     test:
          
      403. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    403. 
            
            

            

                #       secret_key_base: 5a37811464e7d378488b0f073e2193b093682e4e21f5d6f3ae0a4e1781e61a351fdc878a843424e81c73fb484a40d23f92c8dafac4870e74ede6e5e174423010
          
      404. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    404. 
            
            

            

                #     production:
          
      405. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    405. 
            
            

            

                #       secret_key_base: <%= ENV["SECRET_KEY_BASE"] %>
          
      406. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    406. 
            
            

            

                #       namespace: my_app_production
          
      407. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    407. 
            
            

            

                #
          
      408. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    408. 
            
            

            

                # +Rails.application.secrets.namespace+ returns +my_app_production+ in the
          
      409. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    409. 
            
            

            

                # production environment.
          
      410. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    410. 
            
            

            

                def secrets
          
      411. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    411. 
            
            

            

                  @secrets ||= begin
          
      412. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    412. 
            
            

            

                    secrets = ActiveSupport::OrderedOptions.new
          
      413. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    413. 
            
            

            

                    files = config.paths["config/secrets"].existent
          
      414. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    414. 
            
            

            

                    files = files.reject { |path| path.end_with?(".enc") } unless config.read_encrypted_secrets
          
      415. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    415. 
            
            

            

                    secrets.merge! Rails::Secrets.parse(files, env: Rails.env)
          
      416. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    416. 
            
            

            

            
          
      417. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    417. 
            
            

            

                    # Fallback to config.secret_key_base if secrets.secret_key_base isn't set
          
      418. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    418. 
            
            

            

                    secrets.secret_key_base ||= config.secret_key_base
          
      419. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    419. 
            
            

            

            
          
      420. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    420. 
            
            

            

                    secrets
          
      421. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    421. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      422. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    422. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      423. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    423. 
            
            

            

            
          
      424. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    424. 
            
            

            

                attr_writer :secrets
          
      425. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    425. 
            
            

            

            
          
      426. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    426. 
            
            

            

                # The secret_key_base is used as the input secret to the application's key generator, which in turn
          
      427. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    427. 
            
            

            

                # is used to create all MessageVerifiers/MessageEncryptors, including the ones that sign and encrypt cookies.
          
      428. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    428. 
            
            

            

                #
          
      429. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    429. 
            
            

            

                # In development and test, this is randomly generated and stored in a
          
      430. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    430. 
            
            

            

                # temporary file in <tt>tmp/development_secret.txt</tt>.
          
      431. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    431. 
            
            

            

                #
          
      432. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    432. 
            
            

            

                # In all other environments, we look for it first in ENV["SECRET_KEY_BASE"],
          
      433. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    433. 
            
            

            

                # then credentials.secret_key_base, and finally secrets.secret_key_base. For most applications,
          
      434. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    434. 
            
            

            

                # the correct place to store it is in the encrypted credentials file.
          
      435. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    435. 
            
            

            

                def secret_key_base
          
      436. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    436. 
            
            

            

                  if Rails.env.development? || Rails.env.test?
          
      437. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    437. 
            
            

            

                    secrets.secret_key_base ||= generate_development_secret
          
      438. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    438. 
            
            

            

                  else
          
      439. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    439. 
            
            

            

                    validate_secret_key_base(
          
      440. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    440. 
            
            

            

                      ENV["SECRET_KEY_BASE"] || credentials.secret_key_base || secrets.secret_key_base
          
      441. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    441. 
            
            

            

                    )
          
      442. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    442. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      443. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    443. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      444. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    444. 
            
            

            

            
          
      445. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    445. 
            
            

            

                # Decrypts the credentials hash as kept in +config/credentials.yml.enc+. This file is encrypted with
          
      446. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    446. 
            
            

            

                # the Rails master key, which is either taken from <tt>ENV["RAILS_MASTER_KEY"]</tt> or from loading
          
      447. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    447. 
            
            

            

                # +config/master.key+.
          
      448. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    448. 
            
            

            

                # If specific credentials file exists for current environment, it takes precedence, thus for +production+
          
      449. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    449. 
            
            

            

                # environment look first for +config/credentials/production.yml.enc+ with master key taken
          
      450. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    450. 
            
            

            

                # from <tt>ENV["RAILS_MASTER_KEY"]</tt> or from loading +config/credentials/production.key+.
          
      451. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    451. 
            
            

            

                # Default behavior can be overwritten by setting +config.credentials.content_path+ and +config.credentials.key_path+.
          
      452. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    452. 
            
            

            

                def credentials
          
      453. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    453. 
            
            

            

                  @credentials ||= encrypted(config.credentials.content_path, key_path: config.credentials.key_path)
          
      454. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    454. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      455. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    455. 
            
            

            

            
          
      456. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    456. 
            
            

            

                # Shorthand to decrypt any encrypted configurations or files.
          
      457. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    457. 
            
            

            

                #
          
      458. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    458. 
            
            

            

                # For any file added with <tt>rails encrypted:edit</tt> call +read+ to decrypt
          
      459. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    459. 
            
            

            

                # the file with the master key.
          
      460. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    460. 
            
            

            

                # The master key is either stored in +config/master.key+ or <tt>ENV["RAILS_MASTER_KEY"]</tt>.
          
      461. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    461. 
            
            

            

                #
          
      462. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    462. 
            
            

            

                #   Rails.application.encrypted("config/mystery_man.txt.enc").read
          
      463. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    463. 
            
            

            

                #   # => "We've met before, haven't we?"
          
      464. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    464. 
            
            

            

                #
          
      465. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    465. 
            
            

            

                # It's also possible to interpret encrypted YAML files with +config+.
          
      466. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    466. 
            
            

            

                #
          
      467. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    467. 
            
            

            

                #   Rails.application.encrypted("config/credentials.yml.enc").config
          
      468. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    468. 
            
            

            

                #   # => { next_guys_line: "I don't think so. Where was it you think we met?" }
          
      469. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    469. 
            
            

            

                #
          
      470. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    470. 
            
            

            

                # Any top-level configs are also accessible directly on the return value:
          
      471. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    471. 
            
            

            

                #
          
      472. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    472. 
            
            

            

                #   Rails.application.encrypted("config/credentials.yml.enc").next_guys_line
          
      473. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    473. 
            
            

            

                #   # => "I don't think so. Where was it you think we met?"
          
      474. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    474. 
            
            

            

                #
          
      475. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    475. 
            
            

            

                # The files or configs can also be encrypted with a custom key. To decrypt with
          
      476. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    476. 
            
            

            

                # a key in the +ENV+, use:
          
      477. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    477. 
            
            

            

                #
          
      478. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    478. 
            
            

            

                #   Rails.application.encrypted("config/special_tokens.yml.enc", env_key: "SPECIAL_TOKENS")
          
      479. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    479. 
            
            

            

                #
          
      480. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    480. 
            
            

            

                # Or to decrypt with a file, that should be version control ignored, relative to +Rails.root+:
          
      481. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    481. 
            
            

            

                #
          
      482. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    482. 
            
            

            

                #   Rails.application.encrypted("config/special_tokens.yml.enc", key_path: "config/special_tokens.key")
          
      483. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    483. 
            
            

            

                def encrypted(path, key_path: "config/master.key", env_key: "RAILS_MASTER_KEY")
          
      484. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    484. 
            
            

            

                  ActiveSupport::EncryptedConfiguration.new(
          
      485. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    485. 
            
            

            

                    config_path: Rails.root.join(path),
          
      486. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    486. 
            
            

            

                    key_path: Rails.root.join(key_path),
          
      487. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    487. 
            
            

            

                    env_key: env_key,
          
      488. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    488. 
            
            

            

                    raise_if_missing_key: config.require_master_key
          
      489. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    489. 
            
            

            

                  )
          
      490. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    490. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      491. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    491. 
            
            

            

            
          
      492. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    492. 
            
            

            

                def to_app #:nodoc:
          
      493. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    493. 
            
            

            

                  self
          
      494. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    494. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      495. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    495. 
            
            

            

            
          
      496.

                def helpers_paths #:nodoc:

                end
          
      499. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    499. 
            
            

            

            
          
      500.

                console do
          
      501. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    501. 
            
            

            

                  unless ::Kernel.private_method_defined?(:y)
          
      502.

                    require "psych/y"
          
      503.

                  end
          
      504. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    504. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      505. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    505. 
            
            

            

            
          
      506. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    506. 
            
            

            

                # Return an array of railties respecting the order they're loaded
          
      507. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    507. 
            
            

            

                # and the order specified by the +railties_order+ config.
          
      508. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    508. 
            
            

            

                #
          
      509. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    509. 
            
            

            

                # While running initializers we need engines in reverse order here when
          
      510. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    510. 
            
            

            

                # copying migrations from railties ; we need them in the order given by
          
      511. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    511. 
            
            

            

                # +railties_order+.
          
      512. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    512. 
            
            

            

                def migration_railties # :nodoc:
          
      513. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    513. 
            
            

            

                  ordered_railties.flatten - [self]
          
      514. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    514. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      515. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    515. 
            
            

            

            
          
      516. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    516. 
            
            

            

                # Eager loads the application code.
          
      517. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    517. 
            
            

            

                def eager_load!
          
      518. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    518. 
            
            

            

                  if Rails.autoloaders.zeitwerk_enabled?
          
      519. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    519. 
            
            

            

                    Rails.autoloaders.each(&:eager_load)
          
      520. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    520. 
            
            

            

                  else
          
      521. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    521. 
            
            

            

                    super
          
      522. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    522. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      523. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    523. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      524. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    524. 
            
            

            

            
          
      525. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    525. 
            
            

            

              protected
          
      526. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    526. 
            
            

            

                alias :build_middleware_stack :app
          
      527. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    527. 
            
            

            

            
          
      528. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    528. 
            
            

            

                def run_tasks_blocks(app) #:nodoc:
          
      529. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    529. 
            
            

            

                  railties.each { |r| r.run_tasks_blocks(app) }
          
      530. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    530. 
            
            

            

                  super
          
      531. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    531. 
            
            

            

                  require "rails/tasks"
          
      532. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    532. 
            
            

            

                  task :environment do
          
      533. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    533. 
            
            

            

                    ActiveSupport.on_load(:before_initialize) { config.eager_load = config.rake_eager_load }
          
      534. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    534. 
            
            

            

            
          
      535. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    535. 
            
            

            

                    require_environment!
          
      536. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    536. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      537. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    537. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      538.

                # Returns the ordered railties for this application considering railties_order.
          
      555. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    555. 
            
            

            

                def ordered_railties #:nodoc:
          
      556. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    556. 
            
            

            

                  @ordered_railties ||= begin
          
      557. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    557. 
            
            

            

                    order = config.railties_order.map do |railtie|
          
      558. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    558. 
            
            

            

                      if railtie == :main_app
          
      559. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    559. 
            
            

            

                        self
          
      560. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    560. 
            
            

            

                      elsif railtie.respond_to?(:instance)
          
      561. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    561. 
            
            

            

                        railtie.instance
          
      562. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    562. 
            
            

            

                      else
          
      563. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    563. 
            
            

            

                        railtie
          
      564. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    564. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      565. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    565. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      566. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    566. 
            
            

            

            
          
      567. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    567. 
            
            

            

                    all = (railties - order)
          
      568. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    568. 
            
            

            

                    all.push(self)   unless (all + order).include?(self)
          
      569. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    569. 
            
            

            

                    order.push(:all) unless order.include?(:all)
          
      570. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    570. 
            
            

            

            
          
      571. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    571. 
            
            

            

                    index = order.index(:all)
          
      572. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    572. 
            
            

            

                    order[index] = all
          
      573. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    573. 
            
            

            

                    order
          
      574. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    574. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      575. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    575. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      576. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    576. 
            
            

            

            
          
      577. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    577. 
            
            

            

                def railties_initializers(current) #:nodoc:

                  initializers = []
          
      579. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    579. 
            
            

            

                  ordered_railties.reverse.flatten.each do |r|
          
      580. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    580. 
            
            

            

                    if r == self
          
      581.

                def validate_secret_key_base(secret_key_base)
          
      595. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    595. 
            
            

            

                  if secret_key_base.is_a?(String) && secret_key_base.present?
          
      596. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    596. 
            
            

            

                    secret_key_base
          
      597. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    597. 
            
            

            

                  elsif secret_key_base
          
      598. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    598. 
            
            

            

                    raise ArgumentError, "`secret_key_base` for #{Rails.env} environment must be a type of String`"
          
      599. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    599. 
            
            

            

                  else
          
      600. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    600. 
            
            

            

                    raise ArgumentError, "Missing `secret_key_base` for '#{Rails.env}' environment, set this string with `bin/rails credentials:edit`"
          
      601. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    601. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      602.

                  def generate_development_secret
          
      606. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    606. 
            
            

            

                    if secrets.secret_key_base.nil?

                      key_file = Rails.root.join("tmp/development_secret.txt")

    608. 
            
            

            

            
          
      609.

                      if !File.exist?(key_file)

    610. 
            
            

            

                        random_key = SecureRandom.hex(64)

                  # Loads default configurations. See {the result of the method for each version}[https://guides.rubyonrails.org/configuring.html#results-of-config-load-defaults].

                  def load_defaults(target_version)
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            
            

            

                    case target_version.to_s
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            
            

            

                    when "5.0"
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            
            

            

                      if respond_to?(:action_controller)
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            
            

            

                        action_controller.per_form_csrf_tokens = true
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            
            

            

                        action_controller.forgery_protection_origin_check = true
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            
            

            

            
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            
            

            

                      ActiveSupport.to_time_preserves_timezone = true
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            
            

            

            
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            
            

            

                      if respond_to?(:active_record)
          
      91.

                        active_record.belongs_to_required_by_default = true
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92.

      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            
            

            

            
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            
            

            

                      self.ssl_options = { hsts: { subdomains: true } }
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            
            

            

                    when "5.1"
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96.

      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97.

                      if respond_to?(:active_job)

      174.

      175.

      176.

                      if respond_to?(:action_dispatch)
          
      177.

                        action_dispatch.cookies_same_site_protection = :lax
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            
            

            

                        action_dispatch.ssl_default_redirect_status = 308
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      180.

                      if respond_to?(:action_controller)
          
      182.

                        action_controller.urlsafe_csrf_tokens = true
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            
            

            

            
          
      185.

                      ActiveSupport.utc_to_local_returns_utc_offset_times = true
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            
            

            

                    else
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            
            

            

                      raise "Unknown version #{target_version.to_s.inspect}"
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            
            

            

            
          
      190.

                    @loaded_config_version = target_version
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            
            

            

            
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            17
            

            

                  def encoding=(value)
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            17
            

            

                    @encoding = value
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            17
            

            

                    silence_warnings do
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            17
            

            

                      Encoding.default_external = value
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            17
            

            

                      Encoding.default_internal = value
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            
            

            

            
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            17
            

            

                  def api_only=(value)
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            
            

            

                    @api_only = value
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            
            

            

                    generators.api_only = value
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            
            

            

            
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            
            

            

                    @debug_exception_response_format ||= :api
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            
            

            

            
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            17
            

            

                  def debug_exception_response_format
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            
            

            

                    @debug_exception_response_format || :default
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            
            

            

            
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            17
            

            

                  attr_writer :debug_exception_response_format
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            
            

            

            
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            17
            

            

                  def paths
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            33
            

            

                    @paths ||= begin
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            17
            

            

                      paths = super
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            17
            

            

                      paths.add "config/database",    with: "config/database.yml"
          
      218.

            17

                  # Load the database YAML without evaluating ERB. This allows us to
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            
            

            

                  # create the rake tasks for multiple databases without filling in the
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            
            

            

                  # configuration values or loading the environment. Do not use this
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            
            

            

                  # method.
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            
            

            

                  # This uses a DummyERB custom compiler so YAML can ignore the ERB
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            
            

            

                  # tags and load the database.yml for the rake tasks.
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            17
            

            

                  def load_database_yaml # :nodoc:
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            
            

            

                    if path = paths["config/database"].existent.first
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            
            

            

                      require "rails/application/dummy_erb_compiler"
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            
            

            

            
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            
            

            

                      yaml = Pathname.new(path)
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            
            

            

                      erb = DummyERB.new(yaml.read)
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            
            

            

            
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            
            

            

                      YAML.load(erb.result) || {}
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            
            

            

                    else
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            
            

            

                      {}
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            
            

            

            
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            
            

            

                  # Loads and returns the entire raw configuration of database from
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            
            

            

                  # values stored in <tt>config/database.yml</tt>.
          
      252.

            17
            

            

                  def database_configuration
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            
            

            

                    path = paths["config/database"].existent.first
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            
            

            

                    yaml = Pathname.new(path) if path
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            
            

            

            
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            
            

            

                    config = if yaml&.exist?
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            
            

            

                      loaded_yaml = ActiveSupport::ConfigurationFile.parse(yaml)
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            
            

            

                      if (shared = loaded_yaml.delete("shared"))
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            
            

            

                        loaded_yaml.each do |_k, values|
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            
            

            

                          values.reverse_merge!(shared)
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            
            

            

                        end
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            
            

            

                      Hash.new(shared).merge(loaded_yaml)
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            
            

            

                    elsif ENV["DATABASE_URL"]
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            
            

            

                      # Value from ENV['DATABASE_URL'] is set to default database connection
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            
            

            

                      # by Active Record.
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            
            

            

                      {}
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            
            

            

                    else
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            
            

            

                      raise "Could not load database configuration. No such file - #{paths["config/database"].instance_variable_get(:@paths)}"
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            
            

            

            
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            
            

            

                    config
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            
            

            

                  rescue => e
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            
            

            

                    raise e, "Cannot load database configuration:\n#{e.message}", e.backtrace
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276.

                  def autoloader=(autoloader)

                    def method_missing(method, *args)

                      if method.end_with?("=")
          
      368.

                        @configurations[:"#{method[0..-2]}"] = args.first

                          @configurations[method] = ActiveSupport::OrderedOptions.new

                  def build_stack
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            
            

            

                    ActionDispatch::MiddlewareStack.new do |middleware|
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            
            

            

                      middleware.use ::ActionDispatch::HostAuthorization, config.hosts, config.action_dispatch.hosts_response_app
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            
            

            

            
          
      18.

                      if config.force_ssl

      49.

                    ActiveSupport::Deprecation.warn(<<~WARNING)
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            
            

            

                      Initialization autoloaded the #{constants} #{enum}.
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            
            

            

            
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            
            

            

                      Being able to do this is deprecated. Autoloading during initialization is going
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            
            

            

                      to be an error condition in future versions of Rails.
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            
            

            

            
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            
            

            

                      Reloading does not reboot the application, and therefore code executed during
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            
            

            

                      initialization does not run again. So, if you reload #{example}, for example,
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            
            

            

                      the expected changes won't be reflected in that stale #{example_klass} object.
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            
            

            

            
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            
            

            

                      #{unload_message}
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            
            

            

            
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            
            

            

                      In order to autoload safely at boot time, please wrap your code in a reloader
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            
            

            

                      callback this way:
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            
            

            

            
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            
            

            

                          Rails.application.reloader.to_prepare do
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            
            

            

                            # Autoload classes and modules needed at boot time here.
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            
            

            

                          end
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            
            

            

            
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            
            

            

                      That block runs when the application boots, and every time there is a reload.
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            
            

            

                      For historical reasons, it may run twice, so it has to be idempotent.
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            
            

            

            
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            
            

            

                      Check the "Autoloading and Reloading Constants" guide to learn more about how
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            
            

            

                      Rails autoloads and reloads.
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            
            

            

                    WARNING
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      77.

                    if config.autoloader == :zeitwerk
          
      80.

                      require "active_support/dependencies/zeitwerk_integration"
          
      81.

                      ActiveSupport::Dependencies::ZeitwerkIntegration.take_over(enable_reloading: !config.cache_classes)

      87.

                  class MutexHook
          
      144.

                    def initialize(mutex = Mutex.new)
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            
            

            

                      @mutex = mutex
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            
            

            

            
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            
            

            

                    def run
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            
            

            

                      @mutex.lock
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            
            

            

            
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            
            

            

                    def complete(_state)
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            
            

            

                      @mutex.unlock
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155.

                  module InterlockHook
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            
            

            

                    def self.run
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            
            

            

                      ActiveSupport::Dependencies.interlock.start_running
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            
            

            

            
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            
            

            

                    def self.complete(_state)
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            
            

            

                      ActiveSupport::Dependencies.interlock.done_running
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            
            

            

            
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            
            

            

                  initializer :configure_executor_for_concurrency do |app|
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            
            

            

                    if config.allow_concurrency == false
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            
            

            

                      # User has explicitly opted out of concurrent request
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            
            

            

                      # handling: presumably their code is not threadsafe
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            
            

            

            
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            
            

            

                      app.executor.register_hook(MutexHook.new, outer: true)
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            
            

            

            
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            
            

            

                    elsif config.allow_concurrency == :unsafe
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            
            

            

                      # Do nothing, even if we know this is dangerous. This is the
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            
            

            

                      # historical behavior for true.
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            
            

            

            
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            
            

            

                    else
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            
            

            

                      # Default concurrency setting: enabled, but safe
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            
            

            

            
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            
            

            

                      unless config.cache_classes && config.eager_load
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            
            

            

                        # Without cache_classes + eager_load, the load interlock
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            
            

            

                        # is required for proper operation
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            
            

            

            
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            
            

            

                        app.executor.register_hook(InterlockHook, outer: true)
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            
            

            

            
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            
            

            

                  # Set routes reload after the finisher hook to ensure routes added in
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            
            

            

                  # the hook are taken into account.
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            
            

            

                  initializer :set_routes_reloader_hook do |app|
          
      193.

                    reloader = routes_reloader

                    reloader.eager_load = app.config.eager_load

                    reloader.execute
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            
            

            

                    reloaders << reloader
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            
            

            

                    app.reloader.to_run do
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            
            

            

                      # We configure #execute rather than #execute_if_updated because if
          
      199.

                      # autoloaded constants are cleared we need to reload routes also in
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            
            

            

                      # case any was used there, as in
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            
            

            

                      #
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            
            

            

                      #   mount MailPreview => 'mail_view'
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            
            

            

                      #
          
      204.

                      # This means routes are also reloaded if i18n is updated, which
          
      205.

                      # might not be necessary, but in order to be more precise we need

                      require_unload_lock!
          
      208.

      211.

      212.

                  # Set clearing dependencies after the finisher hook to ensure paths

                  # added in the hook are taken into account.

                  initializer :set_clear_dependencies_hook, group: :all do |app|
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            
            

            

                    callback = lambda do
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            
            

            

                      ActiveSupport::DescendantsTracker.clear
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            
            

            

                      ActiveSupport::Dependencies.clear
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            
            

            

            
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            
            

            

                    if config.cache_classes
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            
            

            

                      app.reloader.check = lambda { false }
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            
            

            

                    elsif config.reload_classes_only_on_change
          
      223.

                      app.reloader.check = lambda do

                        app.reloaders.map(&:updated?).any?

                    else
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            
            

            

                      app.reloader.check = lambda { true }
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            
            

            

            
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            
            

            

                    if config.cache_classes
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            
            

            

                      # No reloader
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            
            

            

                    elsif config.reload_classes_only_on_change
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            
            

            

                      reloader = config.file_watcher.new(*watchable_args, &callback)
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            
            

            

                      reloaders << reloader
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            
            

            

            
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            
            

            

                      # Prepend this callback to have autoloaded constants cleared before
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            
            

            

                      # any other possible reloading, in case they need to autoload fresh
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            
            

            

                      # constants.
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            
            

            

                      app.reloader.to_run(prepend: true) do
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            
            

            

                        # In addition to changes detected by the file watcher, if routes
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            
            

            

                        # or i18n have been updated we also need to clear constants,
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            
            

            

                        # that's why we run #execute rather than #execute_if_updated, this
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            
            

            

                        # callback has to clear autoloaded constants after any update.
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            
            

            

                        class_unload! do
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            
            

            

                          reloader.execute
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            
            

            

                        end
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            
            

            

                    else
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            
            

            

                      app.reloader.to_complete do
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            
            

            

                        class_unload!(&callback)
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            
            

            

            
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            
            

            

                  # Disable dependency loading during request cycle
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            
            

            

                  initializer :disable_dependency_loading do
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            
            

            

                    if config.eager_load && config.cache_classes && !config.enable_dependency_loading
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            
            

            

                      ActiveSupport::Dependencies.unhook!
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            
            

            

              end

            end

            # frozen_string_literal: true

            require "active_support/core_ext/module/delegation"

            module Rails
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            
            

            

              class Application
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            
            

            

                class RoutesReloader
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            
            

            

                  attr_reader :route_sets, :paths, :external_routes
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            
            

            

                  attr_accessor :eager_load
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            
            

            

                  delegate :execute_if_updated, :execute, :updated?, to: :updater
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            
            

            

            
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            
            

            

                  def initialize
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            
            

            

                    @paths      = []
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            
            

            

                    @route_sets = []
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            
            

            

                    @external_routes = []
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            
            

            

                    @eager_load = false
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            
            

            

            
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            
            

            

                  def reload!
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            
            

            

                    clear!
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            
            

            

                    load_paths
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            
            

            

                    finalize!
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            
            

            

                    route_sets.each(&:eager_load!) if eager_load
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            
            

            

                  ensure
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            
            

            

                    revert
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27.

                def calculate_directory_statistics(directory, pattern = /^(?!\.).*?\.(rb|js|ts|coffee|rake)$/)

      50.

                      stats.add(calculate_directory_statistics(path, pattern))

                    elsif file_name&.match?(pattern)

                def calculate_total

                def calculate_code

                def width_for(label)
          
      78.

                def print_line(name, statistics)
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            
            

            

                  m_over_c   = (statistics.methods / statistics.classes) rescue 0
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            
            

            

                  loc_over_m = (statistics.code_lines / statistics.methods) - 2 rescue 0
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            
            

            

            
          
      103.

    104. 
            
            

            

                  HEADERS.each_key do |k|

                    print "| #{statistics.send(k).to_s.rjust(width_for(k))} "
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            
            

            

                  puts "| #{m_over_c.to_s.rjust(3)} | #{loc_over_m.to_s.rjust(5)} |"

    108. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109.

                def print_code_test_stats

                  code  = calculate_code

    113.

              def add_by_io(io, file_type)
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            
            

            

                patterns = PATTERNS[file_type] || {}
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            
            

            

            
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            
            

            

                comment_started = false

    56. 
            
            

            

            
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            
            

            

                while line = io.gets
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            
            

            

                  @lines += 1
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            
            

            

            
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            
            

            

                  if comment_started
          
      61.
