    498. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      499. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    499. 
            
            

            

                    helpers
          
      500. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    500. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      501. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    501. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      502. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    502. 
            
            

            

            
          
      503. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    503. 
            
            

            

                # Returns all registered helpers paths.
          
      504. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    504. 
            
            

            

                def helpers_paths
          
      505. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    505. 
            
            

            

                  paths["app/helpers"].existent
          
      506. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    506. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      507. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    507. 
            
            

            

            
          
      508. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    508. 
            
            

            

                # Returns the underlying Rack application for this engine.
          
      509. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    509. 
            
            

            

                def app
          
      510. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    510. 
            
            

            

                  @app || @app_build_lock.synchronize {
          
      511. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    511. 
            
            

            

                    @app ||= begin
          
      512. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    512. 
            
            

            

                      stack = default_middleware_stack
          
      513. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    513. 
            
            

            

                      config.middleware = build_middleware.merge_into(stack)
          
      514. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    514. 
            
            

            

                      config.middleware.build(endpoint)
          
      515. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    515. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      516. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    516. 
            
            

            

                  }
          
      517. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    517. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      518. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    518. 
            
            

            

            
          
      519. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    519. 
            
            

            

                # Returns the endpoint for this engine. If none is registered,
          
      520. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    520. 
            
            

            

                # defaults to an ActionDispatch::Routing::RouteSet.
          
      521. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    521. 
            
            

            

                def endpoint
          
      522. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    522. 
            
            

            

                  self.class.endpoint || routes
          
      523. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    523. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      524. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    524. 
            
            

            

            
          
      525. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    525. 
            
            

            

                # Define the Rack API for this engine.
          
      526. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    526. 
            
            

            

                def call(env)
          
      527. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    527. 
            
            

            

                  req = build_request env
          
      528. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    528. 
            
            

            

                  app.call req.env
          
      529. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    529. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      530. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    530. 
            
            

            

            
          
      531. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    531. 
            
            

            

                # Defines additional Rack env configuration that is added on each call.
          
      532. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    532. 
            
            

            

                def env_config
          
      533. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    533. 
            
            

            

                  @env_config ||= {}
          
      534. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    534. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      535. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    535. 
            
            

            

            
          
      536. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    536. 
            
            

            

                # Defines the routes for this engine. If a block is given to
          
      537. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    537. 
            
            

            

                # routes, it is appended to the engine.
          
      538. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    538. 
            
            

            

                def routes(&block)
          
      539. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    539. 
            
            

            

                  @routes ||= ActionDispatch::Routing::RouteSet.new_with_config(config)
          
      540. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    540. 
            
            

            

                  @routes.append(&block) if block_given?
          
      541. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    541. 
            
            

            

                  @routes
          
      542. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    542. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      543. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    543. 
            
            

            

            
          
      544. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    544. 
            
            

            

                # Define the configuration object for the engine.
          
      545. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    545. 
            
            

            

                def config
          
      546. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    546. 
            
            

            

                  @config ||= Engine::Configuration.new(self.class.find_root(self.class.called_from))
          
      547. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    547. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      548. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    548. 
            
            

            

            
          
      549. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    549. 
            
            

            

                # Load data from db/seeds.rb file. It can be used in to load engines'
          
      550. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    550. 
            
            

            

                # seeds, e.g.:
          
      551. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    551. 
            
            

            

                #
          
      552. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    552. 
            
            

            

                # Blog::Engine.load_seed
          
      553. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    553. 
            
            

            

                def load_seed
          
      554. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    554. 
            
            

            

                  seed_file = paths["db/seeds.rb"].existent.first
          
      555. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    555. 
            
            

            

                  return unless seed_file
          
      556. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    556. 
            
            

            

            
          
      557. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    557. 
            
            

            

                  if config.try(:active_job)&.queue_adapter == :async
          
      558. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    558. 
            
            

            

                    with_inline_jobs { load(seed_file) }
          
      559. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    559. 
            
            

            

                  else
          
      560. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    560. 
            
            

            

                    load(seed_file)
          
      561. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    561. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      562. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    562. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      563. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    563. 
            
            

            

            
          
      564. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    564. 
            
            

            

                initializer :load_environment_config, before: :load_environment_hook, group: :all do
          
      565. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    565. 
            
            

            

                  paths["config/environments"].existent.each do |environment|
          
      566. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    566. 
            
            

            

                    require environment
          
      567. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    567. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      568. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    568. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      569. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    569. 
            
            

            

            
          
      570. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    570. 
            
            

            

                initializer :set_load_path, before: :bootstrap_hook do |app|
          
      571. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    571. 
            
            

            

                  _all_load_paths(app.config.add_autoload_paths_to_load_path).reverse_each do |path|
          
      572. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    572. 
            
            

            

                    $LOAD_PATH.unshift(path) if File.directory?(path)
          
      573. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    573. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      574. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    574. 
            
            

            

                  $LOAD_PATH.uniq!
          
      575. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    575. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      576. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    576. 
            
            

            

            
          
      577. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    577. 
            
            

            

                # Set the paths from which Rails will automatically load source files,
          
      578. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    578. 
            
            

            

                # and the load_once paths.
          
      579. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    579. 
            
            

            

                #
          
      580. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    580. 
            
            

            

                # This needs to be an initializer, since it needs to run once
          
      581. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    581. 
            
            

            

                # per engine and get the engine as a block parameter.
          
      582. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    582. 
            
            

            

                initializer :set_autoload_paths, before: :bootstrap_hook do
          
      583. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    583. 
            
            

            

                  ActiveSupport::Dependencies.autoload_paths.unshift(*_all_autoload_paths)
          
      584. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    584. 
            
            

            

                  ActiveSupport::Dependencies.autoload_once_paths.unshift(*_all_autoload_once_paths)
          
      585. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    585. 
            
            

            

            
          
      586. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    586. 
            
            

            

                  config.autoload_paths.freeze
          
      587. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    587. 
            
            

            

                  config.autoload_once_paths.freeze
          
      588. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    588. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      589. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    589. 
            
            

            

            
          
      590. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    590. 
            
            

            

                initializer :set_eager_load_paths, before: :bootstrap_hook do
          
      591. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    591. 
            
            

            

                  ActiveSupport::Dependencies._eager_load_paths.merge(config.eager_load_paths)
          
      592. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    592. 
            
            

            

                  config.eager_load_paths.freeze
          
      593. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    593. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      594. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    594. 
            
            

            

            
          
      595. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    595. 
            
            

            

                initializer :add_routing_paths do |app|
          
      596. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    596. 
            
            

            

                  routing_paths = paths["config/routes.rb"].existent
          
      597. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    597. 
            
            

            

                  external_paths = self.paths["config/routes"].paths
          
      598. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    598. 
            
            

            

                  routes.draw_paths.concat(external_paths)
          
      599. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    599. 
            
            

            

            
          
      600. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    600. 
            
            

            

                  if routes? || routing_paths.any?
          
      601. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    601. 
            
            

            

                    app.routes_reloader.paths.unshift(*routing_paths)
          
      602. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    602. 
            
            

            

                    app.routes_reloader.route_sets << routes
          
      603. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    603. 
            
            

            

                    app.routes_reloader.external_routes.unshift(*external_paths)
          
      604. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    604. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      605. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    605. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      606. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    606. 
            
            

            

            
          
      607. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    607. 
            
            

            

                # I18n load paths are a special case since the ones added
          
      608. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    608. 
            
            

            

                # later have higher priority.
          
      609. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    609. 
            
            

            

                initializer :add_locales do
          
      610. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    610. 
            
            

            

                  config.i18n.railties_load_path << paths["config/locales"]
          
      611. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    611. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      612. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    612. 
            
            

            

            
          
      613. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    613. 
            
            

            

                initializer :add_view_paths do
          
      614. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    614. 
            
            

            

                  views = paths["app/views"].existent
          
      615. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    615. 
            
            

            

                  unless views.empty?
          
      616. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    616. 
            
            

            

                    ActiveSupport.on_load(:action_controller) { prepend_view_path(views) if respond_to?(:prepend_view_path) }
          
      617. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    617. 
            
            

            

                    ActiveSupport.on_load(:action_mailer) { prepend_view_path(views) }
          
      618. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    618. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      619. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    619. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      620. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    620. 
            
            

            

            
          
      621. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    621. 
            
            

            

                initializer :prepend_helpers_path do |app|
          
      622. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    622. 
            
            

            

                  if !isolated? || (app == self)
          
      623. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    623. 
            
            

            

                    app.config.helpers_paths.unshift(*paths["app/helpers"].existent)
          
      624. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    624. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      625. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    625. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      626. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    626. 
            
            

            

            
          
      627. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    627. 
            
            

            

                initializer :load_config_initializers do
          
      628. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    628. 
            
            

            

                  config.paths["config/initializers"].existent.sort.each do |initializer|
          
      629. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    629. 
            
            

            

                    load_config_initializer(initializer)
          
      630. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    630. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      631. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    631. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      632. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    632. 
            
            

            

            
          
      633. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    633. 
            
            

            

                initializer :engines_blank_point do
          
      634. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    634. 
            
            

            

                  # We need this initializer so all extra initializers added in engines are
          
      635. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    635. 
            
            

            

                  # consistently executed after all the initializers above across all engines.
          
      636. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    636. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      637. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    637. 
            
            

            

            
          
      638. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    638. 
            
            

            

                rake_tasks do
          
      639. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    639. 
            
            

            

                  next if is_a?(Rails::Application)
          
      640. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    640. 
            
            

            

                  next unless has_migrations?
          
      641. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    641. 
            
            

            

            
          
      642. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    642. 
            
            

            

                  namespace railtie_name do
          
      643. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    643. 
            
            

            

                    namespace :install do
          
      644. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    644. 
            
            

            

                      desc "Copy migrations from #{railtie_name} to application"
          
      645. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    645. 
            
            

            

                      task :migrations do
          
      646. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    646. 
            
            

            

                        ENV["FROM"] = railtie_name
          
      647. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    647. 
            
            

            

                        if Rake::Task.task_defined?("railties:install:migrations")
          
      648. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    648. 
            
            

            

                          Rake::Task["railties:install:migrations"].invoke
          
      649. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    649. 
            
            

            

                        else
          
      650. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    650. 
            
            

            

                          Rake::Task["app:railties:install:migrations"].invoke
          
      651. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    651. 
            
            

            

                        end
          
      652. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    652. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      653. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    653. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      654. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    654. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      655. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    655. 
            
            

            

                end

                  def self.find_root_with_flag(flag, root_path, default = nil) #:nodoc:
          
      691. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    691. 
            
            

            

                    while root_path && File.directory?(root_path) && !File.exist?("#{root_path}/#{flag}")
          
      692. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    692. 
            
            

            

                      parent = File.dirname(root_path)
          
      693. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    693. 
            
            

            

                      root_path = parent != root_path && parent
          
      694. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    694. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      695. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    695. 
            
            

            

            
          
      696. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    696. 
            
            

            

                    root = File.exist?("#{root_path}/#{flag}") ? root_path : default
          
      697. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    697. 
            
            

            

                    raise "Could not find root path for #{self}" unless root
          
      698. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    698. 
            
            

            

            
          
      699.

                  # Returns an array of generator namespaces that are hidden.
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            
            

            

                  # Generator namespaces may be hidden for a variety of reasons.
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            
            

            

                  # Some are aliased such as "rails:migration" and can be
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            
            

            

                  # invoked with the shorter "migration", others are private to other generators
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            
            

            

                  # such as "css:scaffold".
          
      140.

                      orm      = options[:rails][:orm]

                      test     = options[:rails][:test_framework]
          
      144.

            16

      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145.

      146.

      147.

                      [
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            
            

            

                        "rails",
          
      149.

                        "#{test}:integration",

                  def sorted_groups

                    namespaces = public_namespaces

                    groups = Hash.new { |h, k| h[k] = [] }

                    namespaces.each do |namespace|

                      base = namespace.split(":").first

      214.

                    rails = groups.delete("rails")

    221. 
            
            

            

                    rails.delete("encryption_key_file")
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            
            

            

                    rails.delete("master_key")

                  def find_by_namespace(name, base = nil, context = nil) #:nodoc:
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            
            

            

                    lookups = []
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            
            

            

                    lookups << "#{base}:#{name}"    if base
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            
            

            

                    lookups << "#{name}:#{context}" if context
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            
            

            

            
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            
            

            

                    unless base || context
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            
            

            

                      unless name.to_s.include?(?:)
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            
            

            

                        lookups << "#{name}:#{name}"
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            
            

            

                        lookups << "rails:#{name}"
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            
            

            

                      lookups << "#{name}"
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            
            

            

            
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            
            

            

                    lookup(lookups)
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            
            

            

            
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            
            

            

                    namespaces = subclasses.index_by(&:namespace)
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            
            

            

                    lookups.each do |namespace|
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            
            

            

                      klass = namespaces[namespace]
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            
            

            

                      return klass if klass
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            
            

            

            
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            
            

            

                    invoke_fallbacks_for(name, base) || invoke_fallbacks_for(context, name)
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            
            

            

            
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            
            

            

                  # Receives a namespace, arguments and the behavior to invoke the generator.
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            
            

            

                  # It's used as the default entry point for generate, destroy and update
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            
            

            

                  # commands.
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            16
            

            

                  def invoke(namespace, args = ARGV, config = {})
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            
            

            

                    names = namespace.to_s.split(":")
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            
            

            

                    if klass = find_by_namespace(names.pop, names.any? && names.join(":"))
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            
            

            

                      args << "--help" if args.empty? && klass.arguments.any?(&:required?)
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            
            

            

                      klass.start(args, config)
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            
            

            

                      run_after_generate_callback if config[:behavior] == :invoke
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            
            

            

                    else
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            
            

            

                      options     = sorted_groups.flat_map(&:last)
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            
            

            

                      suggestion  = Rails::Command::Spellchecker.suggest(namespace.to_s, from: options)
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            
            

            

                      suggestion_msg = "Maybe you meant #{suggestion.inspect}?" if suggestion
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            
            

            

            
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            
            

            

                      puts <<~MSG
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            
            

            

                        Could not find generator '#{namespace}'. #{suggestion_msg}
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            
            

            

                        Run `bin/rails generate --help` for more options.
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            
            

            

                      MSG
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            
            

            

            
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            16
            

            

                  def add_generated_file(file) # :nodoc:
          
      290.

                    (@@generated_files ||= []) << file

    291. 
            
            

            

                    file
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            
            

            

            
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            16
            

            

                  private
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295. 
            16
            

            

                    def print_list(base, namespaces) # :doc:
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            
            

            

                      namespaces = namespaces.reject { |n| hidden_namespaces.include?(n) }
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            
            

            

                      super
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            
            

            

            
          
      300. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    300. 
            
            

            

                    # Try fallbacks for the given base.
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301. 
            16
            

            

                    def invoke_fallbacks_for(name, base)
          
      302. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    302. 
            
            

            

                      return nil unless base && fallbacks[base.to_sym]
          
      303. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    303. 
            
            

            

                      invoked_fallbacks = []
          
      304. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    304. 
            
            

            

            
          
      305. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    305. 
            
            

            

                      Array(fallbacks[base.to_sym]).each do |fallback|
          
      306. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    306. 
            
            

            

                        next if invoked_fallbacks.include?(fallback)
          
      307. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    307. 
            
            

            

                        invoked_fallbacks << fallback
          
      308. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    308. 
            
            

            

            
          
      309. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    309. 
            
            

            

                        klass = find_by_namespace(name, fallback)
          
      310. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    310. 
            
            

            

                        return klass if klass
          
      311. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    311. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      312. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    312. 
            
            

            

            
          
      313. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    313. 
            
            

            

                      nil
          
      314. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    314. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      315. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    315. 
            
            

            

            
          
      316. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    316. 
            16
            

            

                    def command_type # :doc:
          
      317. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    317. 
            
            

            

                      @command_type ||= "generator"

    318. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      319. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    319. 
            
            

            

            
          
      320. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    320. 
            16
            

            

                    def lookup_paths # :doc:

                      @lookup_paths ||= %w( rails/generators generators )

                    def file_lookup_paths # :doc:
          
      325. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    325. 
            
            

            

                      @file_lookup_paths ||= [ "{#{lookup_paths.join(',')}}", "**", "*_generator.rb" ]
          
      326.

                    end
          
      327. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    327. 
            
            

            

            
          
      328. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    328. 
            16
            

            

                    def run_after_generate_callback
          
      329. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    329. 
            
            

            

                      if defined?(@@generated_files) && !@@generated_files.empty?
          
      330. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    330. 
            
            

            

                        @after_generate_callbacks.each do |callback|
          
      331. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    331. 
            
            

            

                          callback.call(@@generated_files)
          
      332. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    332. 
            
            

            

                        end
          
      333. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    333. 
            
            

            

                        @@generated_files = []
          
      334. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    334. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      335. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    335. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      336. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    336. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      337. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    337. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      338. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    338. 
            
            

            

            end

      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            
            

            

                  #   gem "RedCloth", ">= 4.1.0", "< 4.2.0"
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            16
            

            

                  def gem(*args)
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            
            

            

                    options = args.extract_options!
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            
            

            

                    name, *versions = args
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            
            

            

            
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            
            

            

                    # Set the message to be shown in logs. Uses the git repo if one is given,
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            
            

            

                    # otherwise use name (version).
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            
            

            

                    parts, message = [ quote(name) ], name.dup
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            
            

            

            
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            
            

            

                    if versions = versions.any? ? versions : options.delete(:version)
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            
            

            

                      _versions = Array(versions)
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            
            

            

                      _versions.each do |version|
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            
            

            

                        parts << quote(version)
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            
            

            

                      message << " (#{_versions.join(", ")})"
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            
            

            

                    message = options[:git] if options[:git]
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            
            

            

            
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            
            

            

                    log :gemfile, message
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            
            

            

            
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            
            

            

                    parts << quote(options) unless options.empty?
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            
            

            

            
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            
            

            

                    in_root do
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            
            

            

                      str = "gem #{parts.join(", ")}"
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            
            

            

                      str = indentation + str
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            
            

            

                      append_file_with_newline "Gemfile", str, verbose: false
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            
            

            

            
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            
            

            

                  # Wraps gem entries inside a group.
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            
            

            

                  #   gem_group :development, :test do
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            
            

            

                  #     gem "rspec-rails"
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            
            

            

                  #   end
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            16
            

            

                  def gem_group(*names, &block)
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            
            

            

                    options = names.extract_options!
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            
            

            

                    str = names.map(&:inspect)
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            
            

            

                    str << quote(options) unless options.empty?
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            
            

            

                    str = str.join(", ")
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            
            

            

                    log :gemfile, "group #{str}"
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            
            

            

            
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            
            

            

                    in_root do
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            
            

            

                      append_file_with_newline "Gemfile", "\ngroup #{str} do", force: true
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            
            

            

                      with_indentation(&block)
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            
            

            

                      append_file_with_newline "Gemfile", "end", force: true
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            
            

            

            
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            16
            

            

                  def github(repo, options = {}, &block)
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            
            

            

                    str = [quote(repo)]
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            
            

            

                    str << quote(options) unless options.empty?
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            
            

            

                    str = str.join(", ")
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            
            

            

                    log :github, "github #{str}"
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            
            

            

            
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            
            

            

                    in_root do
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            
            

            

                      if @indentation.zero?
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            
            

            

                        append_file_with_newline "Gemfile", "\ngithub #{str} do", force: true
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            
            

            

                      else
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            
            

            

                        append_file_with_newline "Gemfile", "#{indentation}github #{str} do", force: true
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            
            

            

                      with_indentation(&block)
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            
            

            

                      append_file_with_newline "Gemfile", "#{indentation}end", force: true
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            
            

            

            
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            
            

            

                  # Add the given source to +Gemfile+
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            
            

            

                  # If block is given, gem entries in block are wrapped into the source group.
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            
            

            

                  #   add_source "http://gems.github.com/"
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            
            

            

                  #   add_source "http://gems.github.com/" do
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            
            

            

                  #     gem "rspec-rails"
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            
            

            

                  #   end
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            16
            

            

                  def add_source(source, options = {}, &block)
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            
            

            

                    log :source, source
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            
            

            

            
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            
            

            

                    in_root do
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            
            

            

                      if block
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            
            

            

                        append_file_with_newline "Gemfile", "\nsource #{quote(source)} do", force: true
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            
            

            

                        with_indentation(&block)
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            
            

            

                        append_file_with_newline "Gemfile", "end", force: true
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            
            

            

                      else
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            
            

            

                        prepend_file "Gemfile", "source #{quote(source)}\n", verbose: false
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            
            

            

            
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            
            

            

                  # Adds a line inside the Application class for <tt>config/application.rb</tt>.
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            
            

            

                  # If options <tt>:env</tt> is specified, the line is appended to the corresponding
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            
            

            

                  # file in <tt>config/environments</tt>.
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            
            

            

                  #   environment do
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            
            

            

                  #     "config.action_controller.asset_host = 'cdn.provider.com'"
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            
            

            

                  #   end
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            
            

            

                  #   environment(nil, env: "development") do
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            
            

            

                  #     "config.action_controller.asset_host = 'localhost:3000'"
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            
            

            

                  #   end
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            16
            

            

                  def environment(data = nil, options = {})
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            
            

            

                    sentinel = "class Application < Rails::Application\n"
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            
            

            

                    env_file_sentinel = "Rails.application.configure do\n"
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            
            

            

                    data ||= yield if block_given?
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            
            

            

            
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            
            

            

                    in_root do
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            
            

            

                      if options[:env].nil?
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            
            

            

                        inject_into_file "config/application.rb", optimize_indentation(data, 4), after: sentinel, verbose: false
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            
            

            

                      else
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            
            

            

                        Array(options[:env]).each do |env|
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            
            

            

                          inject_into_file "config/environments/#{env}.rb", optimize_indentation(data, 2), after: env_file_sentinel, verbose: false
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            
            

            

                        end
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            16
            

            

                  alias :application :environment
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            
            

            

            
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            
            

            

                  # Run a command in git.
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            
            

            

                  #   git :init
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            
            

            

                  #   git add: "this.file that.rb"
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            
            

            

                  #   git add: "onefile.rb", rm: "badfile.cxx"
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            16
            

            

                  def git(commands = {})
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            
            

            

                    if commands.is_a?(Symbol)
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            
            

            

                      run "git #{commands}"
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            
            

            

                    else
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            
            

            

                      commands.each do |cmd, options|
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            
            

            

                        run "git #{cmd} #{options}"
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            
            

            

            
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            
            

            

                  # Create a new file in the <tt>vendor/</tt> directory. Code can be specified
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            
            

            

                  # in a block or a data string can be given.
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            
            

            

                  #   vendor("sekrit.rb") do
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            
            

            

                  #     sekrit_salt = "#{Time.now}--#{3.years.ago}--#{rand}--"
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            
            

            

                  #     "salt = '#{sekrit_salt}'"
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            
            

            

                  #   end
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            
            

            

                  #   vendor("foreign.rb", "# Foreign code is fun")
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            16
            

            

                  def vendor(filename, data = nil)
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            
            

            

                    log :vendor, filename
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            
            

            

                    data ||= yield if block_given?
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            
            

            

                    create_file("vendor/#{filename}", optimize_indentation(data), verbose: false)
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            
            

            

            
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            
            

            

                  # Create a new file in the <tt>lib/</tt> directory. Code can be specified
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            
            

            

                  # in a block or a data string can be given.
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            
            

            

                  #   lib("crypto.rb") do
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            
            

            

                  #     "crypted_special_value = '#{rand}--#{Time.now}--#{rand(1337)}--'"
          
      172.

                  #   end
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            
            

            

                  #   lib("foreign.rb", "# Foreign code is fun")
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            16
            

            

                  def lib(filename, data = nil)
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            
            

            

                    log :lib, filename
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            
            

            

                    data ||= yield if block_given?
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            
            

            

                    create_file("lib/#{filename}", optimize_indentation(data), verbose: false)
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            
            

            

            
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            
            

            

                  # Create a new +Rakefile+ with the provided code (either in a block or a string).
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            
            

            

                  #   rakefile("bootstrap.rake") do
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            
            

            

                  #     project = ask("What is the UNIX name of your project?")
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            
            

            

                  #     <<-TASK
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            
            

            

                  #       namespace :#{project} do
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            
            

            

                  #         task :bootstrap do
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            
            

            

                  #           puts "I like boots!"
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            
            

            

                  #         end
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            
            

            

                  #       end
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            
            

            

                  #     TASK
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            
            

            

                  #   end
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            
            

            

                  #   rakefile('seed.rake', 'puts "Planting seeds"')
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            16
            

            

                  def rakefile(filename, data = nil)
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            
            

            

                    log :rakefile, filename
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            
            

            

                    data ||= yield if block_given?
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            
            

            

                    create_file("lib/tasks/#{filename}", optimize_indentation(data), verbose: false)
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            
            

            

            
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            
            

            

                  # Create a new initializer with the provided code (either in a block or a string).
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            
            

            

                  #   initializer("globals.rb") do
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            
            

            

                  #     data = ""
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            
            

            

                  #     ['MY_WORK', 'ADMINS', 'BEST_COMPANY_EVAR'].each do |const|
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            
            

            

                  #       data << "#{const} = :entp\n"
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            
            

            

                  #     end
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            
            

            

                  #     data
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            
            

            

                  #   end
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            
            

            

                  #   initializer("api.rb", "API_KEY = '123456'")
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            16
            

            

                  def initializer(filename, data = nil)
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            
            

            

                    log :initializer, filename
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            
            

            

                    data ||= yield if block_given?
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            
            

            

                    create_file("config/initializers/#{filename}", optimize_indentation(data), verbose: false)

                  def route(routing_code, namespace: nil)

    270. 
            
            

            

                    routing_code = Array(namespace).reverse.reduce(routing_code) do |code, ns|
