    271. 
            
            

            

                      "namespace :#{ns} do\n#{indent(code, 2)}\nend"
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            
            

            

            
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            
            

            

                    log :route, routing_code

                      log executor, command

                      config = {

                    def quote(value) # :doc:
          
      329. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    329. 
            
            

            

                      if value.respond_to? :each_pair

    331.

    333. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      334. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    334. 
            
            

            

                      return value.inspect unless value.is_a? String

                    # Returns optimized string with indentation

                    def optimize_indentation(value, amount = 0) # :doc:

    345. 
            
            

            

                      return "#{value}\n" unless value.is_a?(String)

                    def with_indentation(&block) # :doc:

    356. 
            
            

            

                      @indentation += 1

                    # Append string to a file with a newline if necessary

            16
            

            

                    def append_file_with_newline(path, str, options = {})

    364. 
            
            

            

                      gsub_file path, /\n?\z/, options do |match|

    365. 
            
            

            

                        match.end_with?("\n") ? "" : "\n#{str}\n"

    366. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      367.

                      def on_conflict_behavior # :doc:
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            
            

            

                        options = base.options.merge(config)
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            
            

            

                        if identical?
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            
            

            

                          say_status :identical, :blue, relative_existing_migration
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            
            

            

                        elsif options[:force]
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            
            

            

                          say_status :remove, :green, relative_existing_migration
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            
            

            

                          say_status :create, :green
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            
            

            

                          unless pretend?
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            
            

            

                            ::FileUtils.rm_rf(existing_migration)
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            
            

            

                            yield
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            
            

            

                          end
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            
            

            

                        elsif options[:skip]
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            
            

            

                          say_status :skip, :yellow
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            
            

            

                        else
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            
            

            

                          say_status :conflict, :red
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            
            

            

                          raise Error, "Another migration is already named #{migration_file_name}: " \
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            
            

            

                            "#{existing_migration}. Use --force to replace this migration " \
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            
            

            

                            "or --skip to ignore conflicted file."
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            
            

            

                        end
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            
            

            

            
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            1
            

            

                      def say_status(status, color, message = relative_destination) # :doc:
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            
            

            

                        base.shell.say_status(status, message, color) if config[:verbose]
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      75.

            end

                # ActiveModel is a class to be implemented by each ORM to allow Rails to
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            
            

            

                # generate customized controller code.
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            
            

            

                #
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            
            

            

                # The API has the same methods as ActiveRecord, but each method returns a
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            
            

            

                # string that matches the ORM API.
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            
            

            

                #
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            
            

            

                # For example:
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            
            

            

                #
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            
            

            

                #   ActiveRecord::Generators::ActiveModel.find(Foo, "params[:id]")
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            
            

            

                #   # => "Foo.find(params[:id])"
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            
            

            

                #
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16.

      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17.

    92. 
            
            

            

                                                       desc: "Skip bootsnap gem"
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            
            

            

            
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            4
            

            

                    class_option :dev,                 type: :boolean, default: false,
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            
            

            

                                                       desc: "Set up the #{name} with Gemfile pointing to your Rails checkout"
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            
            

            

            
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            4
            

            

                    class_option :edge,                type: :boolean, default: false,
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            
            

            

                                                       desc: "Set up the #{name} with Gemfile pointing to Rails repository"
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            
            

            

            
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            4
            

            

                    class_option :master,              type: :boolean, default: false,
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            
            

            

                                                       desc: "Set up the #{name} with Gemfile pointing to Rails repository master branch"
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            
            

            

            
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            4
            

            

                    class_option :rc,                  type: :string, default: nil,
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            
            

            

                                                       desc: "Path to file containing extra configuration options for rails command"
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            
            

            

            
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            4
            

            

                    class_option :no_rc,               type: :boolean, default: false,
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            
            

            

                                                       desc: "Skip loading of extra configuration options from .railsrc file"
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            
            

            

            
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            4
            

            

                    class_option :help,                type: :boolean, aliases: "-h", group: :rails,
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            
            

            

                                                       desc: "Show this help message and quit"
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            
            

            

            
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            3
            

            

                  def initialize(*args)
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            
            

            

                    @gem_filter    = lambda { |gem| true }
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            
            

            

                    @extra_entries = []
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            
            

            

                    super
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            
            

            

            
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            3
            

            

                private
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            3
            

            

                  def gemfile_entry(name, *args) # :doc:
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            
            

            

                    options = args.extract_options!
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            
            

            

                    version = args.first
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            
            

            

                    github = options[:github]
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            
            

            

                    path   = options[:path]
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            
            

            

            
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            
            

            

                    if github
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            
            

            

                      @extra_entries << GemfileEntry.github(name, github)
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            
            

            

                    elsif path
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            
            

            

                      @extra_entries << GemfileEntry.path(name, path)
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            
            

            

                    else
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            
            

            

                      @extra_entries << GemfileEntry.version(name, version)
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            
            

            

                    self
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            
            

            

            
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            3
            

            

                  def gemfile_entries # :doc:
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            
            

            

                    [rails_gemfile_entry,
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            
            

            

                     database_gemfile_entry,
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            
            

            

                     web_server_gemfile_entry,
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            
            

            

                     assets_gemfile_entry,
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            
            

            

                     webpacker_gemfile_entry,
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            
            

            

                     javascript_gemfile_entry,
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            
            

            

                     jbuilder_gemfile_entry,
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            
            

            

                     psych_gemfile_entry,
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            
            

            

                     cable_gemfile_entry,
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            
            

            

                     @extra_entries].flatten.find_all(&@gem_filter)
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            
            

            

            
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            3
            

            

                  def add_gem_entry_filter # :doc:
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            
            

            

                    @gem_filter = lambda { |next_filter, entry|
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            
            

            

                      yield(entry) && next_filter.call(entry)
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            
            

            

                    }.curry[@gem_filter]
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            
            

            

            
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            3
            

            

                  def builder # :doc:
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            
            

            

                    @builder ||= begin
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            
            

            

                      builder_class = get_builder_class
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            
            

            

                      builder_class.include(ActionMethods)
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            
            

            

                      builder_class.new(self)
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            
            

            

            
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            3
            

            

                  def build(meth, *args) # :doc:
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            
            

            

                    builder.send(meth, *args) if builder.respond_to?(meth)
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            
            

            

            
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            3
            

            

                  def create_root # :doc:
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            
            

            

                    valid_const?
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            
            

            

            
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            
            

            

                    empty_directory "."
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            
            

            

                    FileUtils.cd(destination_root) unless options[:pretend]
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            
            

            

            
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            3
            

            

                  def apply_rails_template # :doc:
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            
            

            

                    apply rails_template if rails_template
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            
            

            

                  rescue Thor::Error, LoadError, Errno::ENOENT => e
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            
            

            

                    raise Error, "The template [#{rails_template}] could not be loaded. Error: #{e}"
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            
            

            

            
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            3
            

            

                  def set_default_accessors! # :doc:
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            
            

            

                    self.destination_root = File.expand_path(app_path, destination_root)
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            
            

            

                    self.rails_template = \
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            
            

            

                      case options[:template]
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            
            

            

                      when /^https?:\/\//
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            
            

            

                        options[:template]
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            
            

            

                      when String
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            
            

            

                        File.expand_path(options[:template], Dir.pwd)
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            
            

            

                      else
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            
            

            

                        options[:template]
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            
            

            

            
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            3
            

            

                  def database_gemfile_entry # :doc:
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            
            

            

                    return [] if options[:skip_active_record]
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            
            

            

                    gem_name, gem_version = gem_for_database
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            
            

            

                    GemfileEntry.version gem_name, gem_version,
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            
            

            

                                        "Use #{options[:database]} as the database for Active Record"
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            
            

            

            
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            3
            

            

                  def web_server_gemfile_entry # :doc:
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            
            

            

                    return [] if options[:skip_puma]
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            
            

            

                    comment = "Use Puma as the app server"
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            
            

            

                    GemfileEntry.new("puma", "~> 4.1", comment)
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            
            

            

            
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            3
            

            

                  def include_all_railties? # :doc:
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            
            

            

                    [
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            
            

            

                      options.values_at(
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            
            

            

                        :skip_active_record,
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            
            

            

                        :skip_action_mailer,
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            
            

            

                        :skip_test,
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            
            

            

                        :skip_sprockets,
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            
            

            

                        :skip_action_cable,
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            
            

            

                        :skip_active_job
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            
            

            

                      ),
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            
            

            

                      skip_active_storage?,
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            
            

            

                      skip_action_mailbox?,
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            
            

            

                      skip_action_text?
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            
            

            

                    ].flatten.none?
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            
            

            

            
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            3
            

            

                  def comment_if(value) # :doc:
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            
            

            

                    question = "#{value}?"
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            
            

            

            
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            
            

            

                    comment =
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            
            

            

                      if respond_to?(question, true)
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            
            

            

                        send(question)
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            
            

            

                      else
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            
            

            

                        options[value]
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            
            

            

            
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            
            

            

                    comment ? "# " : ""
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            
            

            

            
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            3
            

            

                  def keeps? # :doc:
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            
            

            

                    !options[:skip_keeps]
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            
            

            

            
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            3
            

            

                  def sqlite3? # :doc:
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            
            

            

                    !options[:skip_active_record] && options[:database] == "sqlite3"
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            
            

            

            
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            3
            

            

                  def skip_active_storage? # :doc:
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            
            

            

                    options[:skip_active_storage] || options[:skip_active_record]
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            
            

            

            
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            3
            

            

                  def skip_action_mailbox? # :doc:
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            
            

            

                    options[:skip_action_mailbox] || skip_active_storage?
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            
            

            

            
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            3
            

            

                  def skip_action_text? # :doc:
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            
            

            

                    options[:skip_action_text] || skip_active_storage?
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            
            

            

            
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            3
            

            

                  def skip_dev_gems? # :doc:
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            
            

            

                    options[:skip_dev_gems]
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            
            

            

            
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            3
            

            

                  class GemfileEntry < Struct.new(:name, :version, :comment, :options, :commented_out)
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            3
            

            

                    def initialize(name, version, comment, options = {}, commented_out = false)
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            
            

            

                      super
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            
            

            

            
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            3
            

            

                    def self.github(name, github, branch = nil, comment = nil)
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            
            

            

                      if branch
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            
            

            

                        new(name, nil, comment, github: github, branch: branch)
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            
            

            

                      else
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            
            

            

                        new(name, nil, comment, github: github)
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            
            

            

            
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            3
            

            

                    def self.version(name, version, comment = nil)
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            
            

            

                      new(name, version, comment)
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            
            

            

            
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            3
            

            

                    def self.path(name, path, comment = nil)
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            
            

            

                      new(name, nil, comment, path: path)
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            
            

            

            
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            3
            

            

                    def version
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            
            

            

                      version = super
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            
            

            

            
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            
            

            

                      if version.is_a?(Array)
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            
            

            

                        version.join("', '")
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            
            

            

                      else
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            
            

            

                        version
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            
            

            

            
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            3
            

            

                  def rails_gemfile_entry
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            
            

            

                    if options.dev?
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            
            

            

                      [
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            
            

            

                        GemfileEntry.path("rails", Rails::Generators::RAILS_DEV_PATH)
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295. 
            
            

            

                      ]
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            
            

            

                    elsif options.edge?
          
      297.

                  def rails_version_specifier(gem_version = Rails.gem_version)

                    if gem_version.segments.size == 3 || gem_version.release.segments.size == 3

      320.

                      ["~> #{patch}", ">= #{gem_version}"]

                  def bundle_command(command, env = {})
          
      372. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    372. 
            
            

            

                    say_status :run, "bundle #{command}"
          
      373. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    373. 
            
            

            

            
          
      374. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    374. 
            
            

            

                    # We are going to shell out rather than invoking Bundler::CLI.new(command)
          
      375. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    375. 
            
            

            

                    # because `rails new` loads the Thor gem and on the other hand bundler uses
          
      376. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    376. 
            
            

            

                    # its own vendored Thor, which could be a different version. Running both
          
      377. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    377. 
            
            

            

                    # things in the same process is a recipe for a night with paracetamol.
          
      378. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    378. 
            
            

            

                    #
          
      379. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    379. 
            
            

            

                    # Thanks to James Tucker for the Gem tricks involved in this call.
          
      380. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    380. 
            
            

            

                    _bundle_command = Gem.bin_path("bundler", "bundle")
          
      381. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    381. 
            
            

            

            
          
      382. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    382. 
            
            

            

                    require "bundler"
          
      383. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    383. 
            
            

            

                    Bundler.with_original_env do
          
      384. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    384. 
            
            

            

                      exec_bundle_command(_bundle_command, command, env)
          
      385. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    385. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      386. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    386. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      387. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    387. 
            
            

            

            
          
      388. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    388. 
            3
            

            

                  def exec_bundle_command(bundle_command, command, env)
          
      389. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    389. 
            
            

            

                    full_command = %Q["#{Gem.ruby}" "#{bundle_command}" #{command}]
          
      390. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    390. 
            
            

            

                    if options[:quiet]
          
      391. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    391. 
            
            

            

                      system(env, full_command, out: File::NULL)
          
      392. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    392. 
            
            

            

                    else
          
      393. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    393. 
            
            

            

                      system(env, full_command)
          
      394. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    394. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      395. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    395. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      396.

                    def app_name
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            
            

            

                      @app_name ||= original_app_name.tr('\\', "").tr("-. ", "_")
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      12.

                    def original_app_name
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            
            

            

                      @original_app_name ||= defined_app_const_base? ? defined_app_name : File.basename(destination_root)

    15. 
            
            

            

                    end

                    def defined_app_const_base

                      Rails.respond_to?(:application) && defined?(Rails::Application) &&
          
      23.

                        Rails.application.is_a?(Rails::Application) && Rails.application.class.name.chomp("::Application")

                    alias :defined_app_const_base? :defined_app_const_base

                    def app_const_base

                    def app_const
          
      34.

                      @app_const ||= "#{app_const_base}::Application"

                    end
          
      36.

                    def valid_const?
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            
            

            

                      if /^\d/.match?(app_const)
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            
            

            

                        raise Error, "Invalid application name #{original_app_name}. Please give a name which does not start with numbers."
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            
            

            

                      elsif RESERVED_NAMES.include?(original_app_name)
          
      41.

      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42.

      43.

      44.

      45.

                  # Invoke a generator based on the value supplied by the user to the
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            
            

            

                  # given option named "name". A class option is created when this method
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            
            

            

                  # is invoked and you can set a hash to customize it.
          
      68.

                  # For example, if the user invoke the controller generator as:

                  # Notice that "rails:generators:test_unit" could be loaded as well, what
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            
            

            

                  # Rails looks for is the first and last parts of the namespace. This is what
          
      90.

                  # allows any test framework to hook into Rails as long as it provides any
          
      91.

                  # ==== Options

    94. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            
            

            

                  # The first and last part used to find the generator to be invoked are
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            
            

            

                  # guessed based on class invokes hook_for, as noticed in the example above.
          
      97.

                  # This can be customized with two options: :in and :as.

      99.

                  # Let's suppose you are creating a generator that needs to invoke the
          
      100.

                  # All hooks come with switches for user interface. If you do not want
          
      135.

      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            
            

            

                  # In some cases, you may want to provide a boolean hook. For example, webrat
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            
            

            

                  # developers might want to have webrat available on controller generator.
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            
            

            

                  # This can be achieved as:
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148.

    150. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            
            

            

                  # Then, if you want webrat to be invoked, just supply:
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            
            

            

                  #   bin/rails generate controller Account --webrat
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            
            

            

                  # The hooks lookup is similar as above:
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            
            

            

                  #

                  #
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            
            

            

                  # ==== Custom invocations
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            
            

            

                  # You can also supply a block to hook_for to customize how the hook is
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            
            

            

                  # going to be invoked. The block receives two arguments, an instance
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            
            

            

                  # of the current class and the class to be invoked.
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            
            

            

                  # For example, in the resource generator, the controller should be invoked
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            
            

            

                  # with a pluralized class name. But by default it is invoked with the same
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            
            

            

                  # name as the resource generator, which is singular. To change this, we
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            
            

            

                  # can give a block to customize how the controller can be invoked.
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            
            

            

                  #   hook_for :resource_controller do |instance, controller|
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            
            

            

                  #     instance.invoke controller, [ instance.name.pluralize ]
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            
            

            

                  #   end
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            16
            

            

                  def self.hook_for(*names, &block)
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            23
            

            

                    options = names.extract_options!
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            23
            

            

                    in_base = options.delete(:in) || base_name
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            23
            

            

                    as_hook = options.delete(:as) || generator_name
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            
            

            

            
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            23
            

            

                    names.each do |name|
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            31
            

            

                      unless class_options.key?(name)
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            24
            

            

                        defaults = if options[:type] == :boolean
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            
            

            

                          {}
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            24
            

            

                        elsif [true, false].include?(default_value_for_option(name, options))
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            2
            

            

                          { banner: "" }
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            
            

            

                        else
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            22
            

            

                          { desc: "#{name.to_s.humanize} to be invoked", banner: "NAME" }
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            
            

            

                        end
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            
            

            

            
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            24
            

            

                        class_option(name, defaults.merge!(options))
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            
            

            

            
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            31
            

            

                      hooks[name] = [ in_base, as_hook ]
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            31
            

            

                      invoke_from_option(name, options, &block)
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            
            

            

            
          
      197.

                  # Remove a previously added hook.
          
      198.

                  def self.remove_hook_for(*names)

            1
            

            

                    remove_invocation(*names)

                  # Make class option aware of Rails::Generators.options and Rails::Generators.aliases.
          
      209.

                  def self.class_option(name, options = {}) #:nodoc:
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            188
            

            

                    options[:desc]    = "Indicates when to generate #{name.to_s.humanize.downcase}" unless options.key?(:desc)
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            188
            

            

                    options[:aliases] = default_aliases_for_option(name, options)
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            188
            

            

                    options[:default] = default_value_for_option(name, options)
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            188
            

            

                    super(name, options)
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            
            

            

            
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            
            

            

                  # Returns the default source root for a given generator. This is used internally
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            
            

            

                  # by rails to set its generators source root. If you want to customize your source
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            
            

            

                  # root, you should use source_root.
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            16
            

            

                  def self.default_source_root
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            39
            

            

                    return unless base_name && generator_name
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            39
            

            

                    return unless default_generator_root
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            19
            

            

                    path = File.join(default_generator_root, "templates")
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            19
            

            

                    path if File.exist?(path)
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      225.

                  # Returns the base root for a common set of generators. This is used to dynamically

                  def self.base_root

            58
            

            

                    __dir__

            16
            

            

                  def self.inherited(base) #:nodoc:
          
      235.

            39
            

            

                    super
          
      236.

                    # Invoke source_root so the default_source_root is set.
          
      238.

            39
            

            

                    base.source_root
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            
            

            

            
          
      240.

            39
            

            

                    if base.name && !base.name.end_with?("Base")
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            23
            

            

                      Rails::Generators.subclasses << base
          
      242.

            23

      244.

                        if base.name.include?("::")
          
      245.

      246.

      248.

      249.

      250.

      251.

                  private
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            
            

            

                    # Check whether the given class names are already taken by user
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            
            

            

                    # application or Ruby on Rails.
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            16
            

            

                    def class_collisions(*class_names)
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            
            

            

                      return unless behavior == :invoke
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            
            

            

                      return if options.skip_collision_check?
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            
            

            

                      return if options.force?
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            
            

            

            
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            
            

            

                      class_names.flatten.each do |class_name|
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            
            

            

                        class_name = class_name.to_s
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            
            

            

                        next if class_name.strip.empty?
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            
            

            

            
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            
            

            

                        # Split the class from its module nesting
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            
            

            

                        nesting = class_name.split("::")
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            
            

            

                        last_name = nesting.pop
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            
            

            

                        last = extract_last_module(nesting)
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            
            

            

            
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            
            

            

                        if last && last.const_defined?(last_name.camelize, false)
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            
            

            

                          raise Error, "The name '#{class_name}' is either already used in your application " \
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            
            

            

                                       "or reserved by Ruby on Rails. Please choose an alternative or use --skip-collision-check "  \
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            
            

            

                                       "or --force to skip this check and run this generator again."
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            
            

            

                        end
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            
            

            

            
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            
            

            

                    # Takes in an array of nested modules and extracts the last module
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            16
            

            

                    def extract_last_module(nesting) # :doc:
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            
            

            

                      nesting.inject(Object) do |last_module, nest|
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            
            

            

                        break unless last_module.const_defined?(nest, false)
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            
            

            

                        last_module.const_get(nest)
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            
            

            

            
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            
            

            

                    # Wrap block with namespace of current application
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            
            

            

                    # if namespace exists and is not skipped
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            16
            

            

                    def module_namespacing(&block) # :doc:
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            
            

            

                      content = capture(&block)
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            
            

            

                      content = wrap_with_namespace(content) if namespaced?
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            
            

            

                      concat(content)
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            
            

            

            
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            16
            

            

                    def indent(content, multiplier = 2) # :doc:
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295. 
            
            

            

                      spaces = " " * multiplier
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            
            

            

                      content.each_line.map { |line| line.blank? ? line : "#{spaces}#{line}" }.join
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            
            

            

            
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            16
            

            

                    def wrap_with_namespace(content) # :doc:
          
      300. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    300. 
            
            

            

                      content = indent(content).chomp
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301. 
            
            

            

                      "module #{namespace.name}\n#{content}\nend\n"
          
      302. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    302. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      303. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    303. 
            
            

            

            
          
      304. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    304. 
            16
            

            

                    def namespace # :doc:
          
      305.

                      Rails::Generators.namespace
          
      306. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    306. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      307. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    307. 
            
            

            

            
          
      308. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    308. 
            16
            

            

                    def namespaced? # :doc:
          
      309. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    309. 
            
            

            

                      !options[:skip_namespace] && namespace
          
      310. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    310. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      311. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    311. 
            
            

            

            
          
      312. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    312. 
            16
            

            

                    def namespace_dirs
          
      313. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    313. 
            
            

            

                      @namespace_dirs ||= namespace.name.split("::").map(&:underscore)

    314. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      315. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    315. 
            
            

            

            
          
      316.

                    def namespaced_path # :doc:
          
      317. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    317. 
            
            

            

                      @namespaced_path ||= namespace_dirs.join("/")
          
      318. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    318. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      319. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    319. 
            
            

            

            
          
      320. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    320. 
            
            

            

                    # Use Rails default banner.
          
      321.

                    def self.banner # :doc:

      323.

                    end
          
      324. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    324. 
            
            

            

            
          
      325. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    325. 
            
            

            

                    # Sets the base_name taking into account the current class namespace.
          
      326.
