                    def self.base_name # :doc:
          
      327. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    327. 
            943
            

            

                      @base_name ||= begin
          
      328. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    328. 
            39
            

            

                        if base = name.to_s.split("::").first
          
      329. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    329. 
            39
            

            

                          base.underscore
          
      330. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    330. 
            
            

            

                        end
          
      331. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    331. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      332. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    332. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      333. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    333. 
            
            

            

            
          
      334. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    334. 
            
            

            

                    # Removes the namespaces and get the generator name. For example,
          
      335. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    335. 
            
            

            

                    # Rails::Generators::ModelGenerator will return "model" as generator name.
          
      336.

                    def self.generator_name # :doc:
          
      337. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    337. 
            938
            

            

                      @generator_name ||= begin
          
      338. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    338. 
            39
            

            

                        if generator = name.to_s.split("::").last
          
      339. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    339. 
            39
            

            

                          generator.delete_suffix!("Generator")
          
      340.

      341.

      342.

                    # Returns the default value for the option name given doing a lookup in
          
      346.

                    # Rails::Generators.options.
          
      347.

                    def self.default_value_for_option(name, options) # :doc:

                      default_for_option(Rails::Generators.options, name, options, options[:default])
          
      349.

      350.

                      default_for_option(Rails::Generators.aliases, name, options, options[:aliases])
          
      355.

                    end
          
      356. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    356. 
            
            

            

            
          
      357.

                    # Returns default for the option name given doing a lookup in config.
          
      358. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    358. 
            16
            

            

                    def self.default_for_option(config, name, options, default) # :doc:
          
      359. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    359. 
            400
            

            

                      if generator_name && (c = config[generator_name.to_sym]) && c.key?(name)
          
      360. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    360. 
            
            

            

                        c[name]
          
      361. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    361. 
            400
            

            

                      elsif base_name && (c = config[base_name.to_sym]) && c.key?(name)
          
      362. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    362. 
            95
            

            

                        c[name]
          
      363. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    363. 
            305
            

            

                      elsif config[:rails].key?(name)
          
      364. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    364. 
            
            

            

                        config[:rails][name]
          
      365. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    365. 
            
            

            

                      else
          
      366. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    366. 
            305
            

            

                        default
          
      367. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    367. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      368. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    368. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      369. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    369. 
            
            

            

            
          
      370. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    370. 
            
            

            

                    # Keep hooks configuration that are used on prepare_for_invocation.
          
      371. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    371. 
            16
            

            

                    def self.hooks #:nodoc:
          
      372. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    372. 
            61
            

            

                      @hooks ||= from_superclass(:hooks, {})
          
      373. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    373. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      374. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    374. 
            
            

            

            
          
      375. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    375. 
            
            

            

                    # Prepare class invocation to search on Rails namespace if a previous
          
      376. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    376. 
            
            

            

                    # added hook is being used.
          
      377. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    377.

                class GeneratedAttribute # :nodoc:

                  INDEX_OPTIONS = %w(index uniq)

            13
            

            

                  UNIQ_INDEX_OPTIONS = %w(uniq)

      12.

                  class << self
          
      17.

                    def parse(column_definition)
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            
            

            

                      name, type, has_index = column_definition.split(":")
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            
            

            

            
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            
            

            

                      # if user provided "name:index" instead of "name:string:index"
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            
            

            

                      # type should be set blank so GeneratedAttribute's constructor
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            
            

            

                      # could set it to :string
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            
            

            

                      has_index, type = type, nil if INDEX_OPTIONS.include?(type)
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            
            

            

            
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            
            

            

                      type, attr_options = *parse_type_and_options(type)
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            
            

            

                      type = type.to_sym if type
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            
            

            

            
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            
            

            

                      if type && reference?(type)
          
      29.

      30.

                    def reference?(type)

                    private
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            
            

            

                      # parse possible attribute options like :limit for string/text/binary/integer, :precision/:scale for decimals or :polymorphic for references/belongs_to
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            
            

            

                      # when declaring options curly brackets should be used
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            13
            

            

                      def parse_type_and_options(type)
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            
            

            

                        case type
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            
            

            

                        when /(string|text|binary|integer)\{(\d+)\}/
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            
            

            

                          return $1, limit: $2.to_i
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            
            

            

                        when /decimal\{(\d+)[,.-](\d+)\}/
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            
            

            

                          return :decimal, precision: $1.to_i, scale: $2.to_i
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            
            

            

                        when /(references|belongs_to)\{(.+)\}/
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            
            

            

                          type = $1
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            
            

            

                          provided_options = $2.split(/[,.-]/)
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            
            

            

                          options = Hash[provided_options.map { |opt| [opt.to_sym, true] }]
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            
            

            

            
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            
            

            

                          if options[:required]
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            
            

            

                            ActiveSupport::Deprecation.warn("Passing {required} option has no effect on the model generator. It will be removed in Rails 6.1.\n")
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            
            

            

                            options.delete(:required)
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            
            

            

                          end
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            
            

            

            
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            
            

            

                          return type, options
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            
            

            

                        else
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            
            

            

                          return type, {}
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            
            

            

                        end
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            
            

            

            
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            13
            

            

                  def initialize(name, type = nil, index_type = false, attr_options = {})
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            
            

            

                    @name           = name
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            
            

            

                    @type           = type || :string
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            
            

            

                    @has_index      = INDEX_OPTIONS.include?(index_type)
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            
            

            

                    @has_uniq_index = UNIQ_INDEX_OPTIONS.include?(index_type)
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            
            

            

                    @attr_options   = attr_options
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            
            

            

            
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            13
            

            

                  def field_type
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            
            

            

                    @field_type ||= case type
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            
            

            

                                    when :integer                  then :number_field
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            
            

            

                                    when :float, :decimal          then :text_field
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            
            

            

                                    when :time                     then :time_select
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            
            

            

                                    when :datetime, :timestamp     then :datetime_select
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            
            

            

                                    when :date                     then :date_select
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            
            

            

                                    when :text                     then :text_area
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            
            

            

                                    when :rich_text                then :rich_text_area
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            
            

            

                                    when :boolean                  then :check_box
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            
            

            

                                    when :attachment, :attachments then :file_field
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            
            

            

                                    else
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            
            

            

                                      :text_field
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            
            

            

            
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            13
            

            

                  def default
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            
            

            

                    @default ||= case type
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            
            

            

                                 when :integer                     then 1
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            
            

            

                                 when :float                       then 1.5
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            
            

            

                                 when :decimal                     then "9.99"
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            
            

            

                                 when :datetime, :timestamp, :time then Time.now.to_s(:db)
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            
            

            

                                 when :date                        then Date.today.to_s(:db)
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            
            

            

                                 when :string                      then name == "type" ? "" : "MyString"
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            
            

            

                                 when :text                        then "MyText"
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            
            

            

                                 when :boolean                     then false
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            
            

            

                                 when :references, :belongs_to,
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            
            

            

                                      :attachment, :attachments,
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            
            

            

                                      :rich_text                   then nil
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            
            

            

                                 else
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            
            

            

                                   ""
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            
            

            

                  end

                  def plural_name

                  def index_name
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            
            

            

                    @index_name ||= if polymorphic?
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            
            

            

                      %w(id type).map { |t| "#{name}_#{t}" }
          
      124.

                    else
          
      125.

                      column_name

                  def column_name
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            
            

            

                    @column_name ||= reference? ? "#{name}_id" : name

                  end

                  def foreign_key?
          
      134.

                  # Creates a migration template at the given destination. The difference
          
      49.

                  # to the default template method is that the migration version is appended

                  def migration_template(source, destination, config = {})

      66.

                      if ERB.instance_method(:initialize).parameters.assoc(:key) # Ruby 2.6+
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67.

                  PLURAL_MODEL_NAME_WARN_MESSAGE = "[WARNING] The model name '%s' was recognized as a plural, using the singular '%s' instead. " \

                  IRREGULAR_MODEL_NAME_WARN_MESSAGE = <<~WARNING
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            
            

            

                  [WARNING] Rails cannot recover singular form from its plural form '%s'.
          
      12.

                  def initialize(args, *_options)

                    parse_attributes! if respond_to?(:attributes)
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            
            

            

            
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            
            

            

                  # Overrides <tt>Thor::Actions#template</tt> so it can tell if
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            
            

            

                  # a template is currently being created.
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            13
            

            

                  no_tasks do
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            13
            

            

                    def template(source, *args, &block)
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            
            

            

                      inside_template do
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            
            

            

                        Rails::Generators.add_generated_file(super)
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            
            

            

            
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            13
            

            

                    def js_template(source, destination)
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            
            

            

                      template(source + ".js", destination + ".js")
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            
            

            

            
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            13
            

            

                  private
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            13
            

            

                    attr_reader :file_name
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            
            

            

            
          
      37.

                    # FIXME: We are avoiding to use alias because a bug on thor that make
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            
            

            

                    # this method public and add it to the task list.
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39.

                    def singular_name # :doc:
          
      40.

                      file_name
          
      41.

                    def inside_template # :doc:
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            
            

            

                      @inside_template = true
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            
            

            

                      yield
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            
            

            

                    ensure
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            
            

            

                      @inside_template = false
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            
            

            

            
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            13
            

            

                    def inside_template? # :doc:

                      @inside_template

                    def class_path # :doc:

                      inside_template? || !namespaced? ? regular_class_path : namespaced_class_path

                    def table_name # :doc:
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            
            

            

                      @table_name ||= begin

                        base = pluralize_table_names? ? plural_name : singular_name
          
      89.

                        (class_path + [base]).join("_")
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91.

                    def uncountable? # :doc:

                      singular_name == plural_name
          
      95.

                    end

                    def plural_table_name # :doc:

                      @plural_table_name ||= (pluralize_table_names? ? table_name : table_name.pluralize)
          
      119.

                    end
          
      120.

                    # Tries to retrieve the application name or simply return application.
          
      138.

                    def application_name # :doc:

                      if defined?(Rails) && Rails.application

                        "application"

                      end

                    def redirect_resource_name # :doc:

                    def model_resource_name(prefix: "") # :doc:
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            
            

            

                      resource_name = "#{prefix}#{singular_table_name}"
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            
            

            

                      if options[:model_name]
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            
            

            

                        "[#{controller_class_path.map { |name| ":" + name }.join(", ")}, #{resource_name}]"
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            
            

            

                      else
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            
            

            

                        resource_name
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            
            

            

            
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            13
            

            

                    def singular_route_name # :doc:
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            
            

            

                      if options[:model_name]
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            
            

            

                        "#{controller_class_path.join('_')}_#{singular_table_name}"
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            
            

            

                      else
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            
            

            

                        singular_table_name
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            
            

            

                      end

    165.

      167.

                    def plural_route_name # :doc:
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            
            

            

                      if options[:model_name]
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            
            

            

                        "#{controller_class_path.join('_')}_#{plural_table_name}"
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            
            

            

                      else
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            
            

            

                        plural_table_name
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            
            

            

            
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            13
            

            

                    def assign_names!(name)
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            
            

            

                      @class_path = name.include?("/") ? name.split("/") : name.split("::")
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            
            

            

                      @class_path.map!(&:underscore)
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            
            

            

                      @file_name = @class_path.pop
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            
            

            

            
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            
            

            

                    # Convert attributes array into GeneratedAttribute objects.
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            13
            

            

                    def parse_attributes!
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            
            

            

                      self.attributes = (attributes || []).map do |attr|
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            
            

            

                        Rails::Generators::GeneratedAttribute.parse(attr)
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            
            

            

            
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            13
            

            

                    def attributes_names # :doc:
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            
            

            

                      @attributes_names ||= attributes.each_with_object([]) do |a, names|
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            
            

            

                        names << a.column_name
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            
            

            

                        names << "password_confirmation" if a.password_digest?
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            
            

            

                        names << "#{a.name}_type" if a.polymorphic?
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            
            

            

            
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            13
            

            

                    def pluralize_table_names? # :doc:
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            
            

            

                      !defined?(ActiveRecord::Base) || ActiveRecord::Base.pluralize_table_names
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            
            

            

            
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            13
            

            

                    def mountable_engine? # :doc:
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            
            

            

                      defined?(ENGINE_ROOT) && namespaced?
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            
            

            

            
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            
            

            

                    # Add a class collisions name to be checked on class initialization. You
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            
            

            

                    # can supply a hash with a :prefix or :suffix to be tested.
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            
            

            

                    #
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            
            

            

                    # ==== Examples
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            
            

            

                    #
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            
            

            

                    #   check_class_collision suffix: "Decorator"
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            
            

            

                    #
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            
            

            

                    # If the generator is invoked with class name Admin, it will check for
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            
            

            

                    # the presence of "AdminDecorator".
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            
            

            

                    #
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            13
            

            

                    def self.check_class_collision(options = {}) # :doc:
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            8
            

            

                      define_method :check_class_collision do
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            
            

            

                        name = if respond_to?(:controller_class_name, true) # for ResourceHelpers
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            
            

            

                          controller_class_name
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            
            

            

                        else
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            
            

            

                          class_name
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            
            

            

                        end
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            
            

            

            
          
      222.

              module Generators
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            
            

            

                # We need to store the RAILS_DEV_PATH in a constant, otherwise the path
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            
            

            

                # can change in Ruby 1.8.7 when we FileUtils.cd.
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            3
            

            

                RAILS_DEV_PATH = File.expand_path("../../../../../..", __dir__)
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            
            

            

            
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            3
            

            

                class AppGenerator < AppBase
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            
            

            

                  # :stopdoc:
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            
            

            

            
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            3
            

            

                  WEBPACKS = %w( react vue angular elm stimulus )
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            
            

            

            
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            3
            

            

                  add_shared_options_for "application"
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            
            

            

            
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            
            

            

                  # Add rails command options
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            3
            

            

                  class_option :version, type: :boolean, aliases: "-v", group: :rails,
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            
            

            

                                         desc: "Show Rails version number and quit"
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            
            

            

            
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            3
            

            

                  class_option :api, type: :boolean,
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            
            

            

                                     desc: "Preconfigure smaller stack for API only apps"
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            
            

            

            
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            3
            

            

                  class_option :minimal, type: :boolean,
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            
            

            

                                         desc: "Preconfigure a minimal rails app"
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            
            

            

            
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            3
            

            

                  class_option :skip_bundle, type: :boolean, aliases: "-B", default: false,
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            
            

            

                                             desc: "Don't run bundle install"
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            
            

            

            
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            3
            

            

                  class_option :webpack, type: :string, aliases: "--webpacker", default: nil,
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            
            

            

                                         desc: "Preconfigure Webpack with a particular framework (options: #{WEBPACKS.join(", ")})"
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            
            

            

            
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            3
            

            

                  class_option :skip_webpack_install, type: :boolean, default: false,
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            
            

            

                                                      desc: "Don't run Webpack install"
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            
            

            

            
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            3
            

            

                  def initialize(*args)
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            
            

            

                    super
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            
            

            

            
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            
            

            

                    if !options[:skip_active_record] && !DATABASES.include?(options[:database])
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            
            

            

                      raise Error, "Invalid value for --database option. Supported preconfigurations are: #{DATABASES.join(", ")}."
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            
            

            

            
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            
            

            

                    # Force sprockets and yarn to be skipped when generating API only apps.
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295. 
            
            

            

                    # Can't modify options hash as it's frozen by default.
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            
            

            

                    if options[:api]
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            
            

            

                      self.options = options.merge(skip_sprockets: true, skip_javascript: true).freeze
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            
            

            

            
          
      300. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    300. 
            
            

            

                    if options[:minimal]
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301. 
            
            

            

                      self.options = options.merge(
          
      302. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    302. 
            
            

            

                        skip_action_cable: true,
          
      303. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    303. 
            
            

            

                        skip_action_mailer: true,
          
      304. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    304. 
            
            

            

                        skip_action_mailbox: true,
          
      305. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    305. 
            
            

            

                        skip_action_text: true,
          
      306. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    306. 
            
            

            

                        skip_active_job: true,
          
      307. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    307. 
            
            

            

                        skip_active_storage: true,
          
      308. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    308. 
            
            

            

                        skip_bootsnap: true,
          
      309. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    309. 
            
            

            

                        skip_dev_gems: true,
          
      310. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    310. 
            
            

            

                        skip_javascript: true,
          
      311. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    311. 
            
            

            

                        skip_jbuilder: true,
          
      312. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    312. 
            
            

            

                        skip_spring: true,
          
      313. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    313. 
            
            

            

                        skip_system_test: true,
          
      314. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    314. 
            
            

            

                        skip_webpack_install: true,
          
      315. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    315. 
            
            

            

                        skip_turbolinks: true).tap do |option|
          
      316. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    316. 
            
            

            

                          if option[:webpack]
          
      317. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    317. 
            
            

            

                            option[:skip_webpack_install] = false
          
      318. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    318. 
            
            

            

                            option[:skip_javascript] = false
          
      319. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    319. 
            
            

            

                          end
          
      320. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    320. 
            
            

            

                        end.freeze
          
      321. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    321. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      322. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    322. 
            
            

            

            
          
      323. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    323. 
            
            

            

                    @after_bundle_callbacks = []
          
      324. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    324. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      325. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    325. 
            
            

            

            
          
      326. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    326. 
            3
            

            

                  public_task :set_default_accessors!
          
      327. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    327. 
            3
            

            

                  public_task :create_root
          
      328.

            3
            

            

                  def create_root_files
          
      330. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    330. 
            
            

            

                    build(:readme)
          
      331.

      333.

                    build(:configru)
          
      334. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    334. 
            
            

            

                    build(:gitignore)   unless options[:skip_git]
          
      335. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    335. 
            
            

            

                    build(:gemfile)     unless options[:skip_gemfile]
          
      336. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    336. 
            
            

            

                    build(:version_control)
          
      337. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    337. 
            
            

            

                    build(:package_json) unless options[:skip_javascript]
          
      338.

                  def run_after_bundle_callbacks

                    @after_bundle_callbacks.each(&:call)

                  end

            3
            

            

                  def self.banner
          
      554. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    554. 
            
            

            

                    "rails new #{arguments.map(&:usage).join(' ')} [options]"
          
      555. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    555. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      556. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    556. 
            
            

            

            
          
      557. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    557. 
            
            

            

                # :startdoc:
          
      558. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    558. 
            
            

            

            
          
      559. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    559. 
            3
            

            

                private
          
      560. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    560. 
            
            

            

                  # Define file as an alias to create_file for backwards compatibility.
          
      561. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    561. 
            3
            

            

                  def file(*args, &block)
          
      562. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    562. 
            
            

            

                    create_file(*args, &block)
          
      563. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    563. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      564. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    564. 
            
            

            

            
          
      565. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    565. 
            
            

            

                  # Registers a callback to be executed after bundle and spring binstubs
          
      566. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    566. 
            
            

            

                  # have run.
          
      567. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    567. 
            
            

            

                  #
          
      568. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    568. 
            
            

            

                  #   after_bundle do
          
      569. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    569. 
            
            

            

                  #     git add: '.'
          
      570. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    570. 
            
            

            

                  #   end
          
      571. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    571. 
            3
            

            

                  def after_bundle(&block) # :doc:
          
      572. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    572. 
            
            

            

                    @after_bundle_callbacks << block
          
      573. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    573. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      574. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    574. 
            
            

            

            
          
      575. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    575. 
            3
            

            

                  def get_builder_class
          
      576. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    576. 
            
            

            

                    defined?(::AppBuilder) ? ::AppBuilder : Rails::AppBuilder
          
      577. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    577. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      578. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    578. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      579. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    579. 
            
            

            

            
          
      580. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    580. 
            
            

            

                # This class handles preparation of the arguments before the AppGenerator is
          
      581. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    581. 
            
            

            

                # called. The class provides version or help information if they were
          
      582. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    582. 
            
            

            

                # requested, and also constructs the railsrc file (used for extra configuration
          
      583. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    583. 
            
            

            

                # options).
          
      584. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    584. 
            
            

            

                #
          
      585. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    585. 
            
            

            

                # This class should be called before the AppGenerator is required and started
          
      586. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    586. 
            
            

            

                # since it configures and mutates ARGV correctly.
          
      587. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    587. 
            3
            

            

                class ARGVScrubber # :nodoc:
          
      588. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    588. 
            3
            

            

                  def initialize(argv = ARGV)
          
      589. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    589. 
            
            

            

                    @argv = argv
          
      590. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    590. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      591. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    591. 
            
            

            

            
          
      592. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    592. 
            3
            

            

                  def prepare!
          
      593. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    593. 
            
            

            

                    handle_version_request!(@argv.first)
          
      594. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    594. 
            
            

            

                    handle_invalid_command!(@argv.first, @argv) do
          
      595. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    595. 
            
            

            

                      handle_rails_rc!(@argv.drop(1))
          
      596. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    596. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      597. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    597. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      598. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    598. 
            
            

            

            
          
      599. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    599. 
            3
            

            

                  def self.default_rc_file
          
      600. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    600. 
            
            

            

                    File.expand_path("~/.railsrc")
          
      601. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    601. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      602. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    602. 
            
            

            

            
          
      603. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    603. 
            3
            

            

                  private
          
      604. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    604. 
            3
            

            

                    def handle_version_request!(argument)
          
      605. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    605. 
            
            

            

                      if ["--version", "-v"].include?(argument)
          
      606. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    606. 
            
            

            

                        require "rails/version"
          
      607. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    607. 
            
            

            

                        puts "Rails #{Rails::VERSION::STRING}"
          
      608. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    608. 
            
            

            

                        exit(0)
          
      609. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    609. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      610. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    610. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      611. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    611. 
            
            

            

            
          
      612. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    612. 
            3
            

            

                    def handle_invalid_command!(argument, argv)
          
      613. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    613.

                    def railsrc(argv)
          
      629. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    629. 
            
            

            

                      if (customrc = argv.index { |x| x.include?("--rc=") })
          
      630. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    630. 
            
            

            

                        fname = File.expand_path(argv[customrc].gsub(/--rc=/, ""))
          
      631. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    631. 
            
            

            

                        yield(argv.take(customrc) + argv.drop(customrc + 1), fname)
          
      632. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    632. 
            
            

            

                      else
          
      633. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    633. 
            
            

            

                        yield argv, self.class.default_rc_file
          
      634. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    634. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      635. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    635.

                    def read_rc_file(railsrc)
          
      638. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    638.

    639.

      641.

      642.

                    def insert_railsrc_into_argv!(argv, railsrc)
          
      644. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    644. 
            
            

            

                      return argv unless File.exist?(railsrc)
          
      645. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    645. 
            
            

            

                      extra_args = read_rc_file railsrc
          
      646.

      648.

      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            
            

            

                        end
          
      61.

                    end

                  def ignore_key_file(key_path, ignore: key_ignore(key_path))

                    if File.exist?(".gitignore")

              # generator without being forced to reverse the operations of the default

                def generate_test_dummy(force = false)

                  template "rails/boot.rb", "#{dummy_path}/config/boot.rb", force: true
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            
            

            

            
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            
            

            

                  insert_into_file "#{dummy_path}/config/application.rb", <<~RUBY, after: /^Bundler\.require.+\n/
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            
            

            

                    require #{namespaced_name.inspect}
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            
            

            

                  RUBY
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            
            

            

            
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            
            

            

                  if mountable?
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            
            

            

                    template "rails/routes.rb", "#{dummy_path}/config/routes.rb", force: true
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            
            

            

            
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            1
            

            

                def test_dummy_assets
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            
            

            

                  template "rails/javascripts.js",    "#{dummy_path}/app/javascript/packs/application.js", force: true
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            
            

            

                  template "rails/stylesheets.css",   "#{dummy_path}/app/assets/stylesheets/application.css", force: true
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            
            

            

                  template "rails/dummy_manifest.js", "#{dummy_path}/app/assets/config/manifest.js", force: true
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            
            

            

            
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            1
            

            

                def test_dummy_clean
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            
            

            

                  inside dummy_path do
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            
            

            

                    remove_file ".ruby-version"
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            
            

            

                    remove_file "db/seeds.rb"
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            
            

            

                    remove_file "Gemfile"
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            
            

            

                    remove_file "lib/tasks"
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            
            

            

                    remove_file "public/robots.txt"
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            
            

            

                    remove_file "README.md"
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            
            

            

                    remove_file "test"
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            
            

            

                    remove_file "vendor"
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            
            

            

            
          
      147.
